data.event: Nambu Village was created on April 20, 1955 through the merger of former Hirasaki and Muko villages.

event.title: was elevated to town status on February 11, 1959

data.event: It was elevated to town status on February 11, 1959.
On January 1, 2006, Nanbu merged with Fukuchi and Nagawa into the new town of Nanbu.
